description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Rofaxan 2089 AD Has received praise from many Indie game review sites "A shooter everyone should have and I hate this type of game!" and "A hell of a trip through the nostalgia of yesteryear!" Intense action huge bosses and tons of great music provided by Thunder and Lightning make this a throwback that is very akin to Gates and Lords of Thunder! Retro Game Geeks give it a must have 8 out of 10!
